comments:
Exception when refreshing from local in the Log Navigator view.

After creating the Apache Log Correlation/Analyzer Sample (File >> New >> 
Example... >> Hyades Logging >> Apache Log Correlation/Analyzer Sample) and 
deleting the corresponding LogAnalyzerProject from the Resource perspective and 
attempting to refresh from local in the Log Navigator view, the following 
exceptionoccurs:
